ssot__EmailTemplate__dlm.name: Email Template
ssot__EmailTemplate__dlm.description: The Email Template DMO represents the standard form of an email message that can be personalized and customized based on a campaign.

ssot__APIVersionName__c.description: The variant number of email API used with template.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for logical name for system that is source of records identified by External Record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeliveryPct__c.description: The percentage of emails based on template that were successfully delivered.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for Email Template DMO.

ssot__EmailTemplateStyleId__c.description: A reference ID for enumeration values of Email Template Style: None, FreeForm, FormalLettter, PromotionRight, PromotionLeft, Newsletter, and Products.

ssot__EmailTemplateTypeId__c.description: A reference ID for enumeration values of email template type, such as text or HTML.

ssot__EngagementAssetNbr__c.description: A number assigned to an engagement asset.

ssot__EngagementAssetTypeId__c.description: A reference ID for the description of an engagement asset type, such as an email or phone.

ssot__EngagementMessageTypeId__c.description: A reference ID for the description of an Engagement Message Type. Examples include: Outbound, Location Entry, Location Entry, Beacon.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID for the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when user last modified record.

ssot__MessageFormatTypeId__c.description: A reference ID for description of the format of the asset/template. Examples include Landing Page, Application Alert.

ssot__NamespacePrefixTxt__c.description: A value that defines a unique set of email templates.

ssot__ParentEngagementAssetId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent record’s engagement asset.

ssot__SendClassificationId__c.description: A reference ID for the method of how user consents to email engagement, for example transactional or commercial.

ssot__TimesUsedQty__c.description: The number of times emails based on template has been used to create published emails.

ssot__TotalDeliveredQty__c.description: The number of times emails based on template that were successfully delivered.

ssot__TotalHardBouncedQty__c.description: The number of times emails based on template have hard bounced (invalid email address).

ssot__TotalOpensQty__c.description: The number of times emails based on template have been opened.

ssot__TotalSentQty__c.description: The number of times published emails based on template have been sent.

ssot__TotalSoftBouncedQty__c.description: The number of times emails based on template have soft bounced (returned by server).

ssot__UITypeTxt__c.description: The description of type of user interface (UI) presented in received email message.
